name: Reborn A Zombie!
description:
Starting from today, My name is Dawn! Don’t I look cute in this?

Dawn recently found out she’s transgender, and she’s ready to embrace this side of herself to its fullest! In a world where humans coexist peacefully with vampires, demons, and other magical beings, she hopes to transform her body for the best.
Helped by Lucia, her asexual succubus friend, she soon finds herself in a tricky situation: her body has changed, yes, but she’s also a zombie now!

“Reborn a zombie!” is a queer story about friendship, acceptance, and a world full of cute monsters! Will she find happiness at the end of her journey, or is it the start of a new one?



Our protagonist! She’s chipper, curious about anything magic, and wants to live in a body that is right for her! Her journey will lead her to Providence, the new capital of magiis.


A succubus from the Demon Realm and talented spell weaver. Her asexuality often clashes with people’s expectation of a succubus, but she found relief in Dawn’s innocent friendship.


A powerful dragon who decided to help Dawn in this bizarre world, but a certain demon isn’t too keen on having her around…


-17k words (about 2 hours of playtime)
-Backgrounds animated with visual effects for more magic!
-A queer story featuring a trans protagonist, a very cute ace succubus and a very buff dragon-lady!
